news_header: Whirlpool reported a revenue decline of 18.7% year-over-year for Q4 2024, with an EPS of $4.57 compared to $3.85 last year.
news_original_title: Whirlpool (WHR) Q4 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
news_text: Whirlpool (WHR) announced $4.14 billion in revenue for the quarter ending December 2024, an 18.7% decrease from the previous year. The EPS was $4.57, up from $3.85 a year ago. The revenue fell short of the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $4.27 billion, reflecting a -3.24% surprise, while the EPS exceeded expectations by 4.10%. Analysts emphasize the importance of key metrics in assessing financial health and stock performance.
